data.title: David Fickling Books
data.text:
Award-winning bestseller Jamie Smart’s newest adventure for young readers, bringing laughter and lots of reader interactions in wonderful comic form.

Chaffies are rare, one and a half-eared, curious creatures. And one in particular is Max’s best friend! Max and Chaffy are off on a hunt for other chaffies across the island where they live. With the help of their friends, they reach a secret spot on the island and encounter a Chaffy never before seen.

And when they find a map in a bottle, it’s time to find the Pirate’s Gold!

Max and Chaffy embark on an underwater adventure to find X marks the spot... and YOU can help!

A laugh-out-loud, interactive adventure story, with a cast of lovable characters sure to engage young readers. Max & Chaffy celebrates the joy that comes with spending itme with friends and shows there's a place for everyone.

A hugely entertaining adventure with a heartfelt core, celebrating different cultures, courage and family bonds, from an award-winning author/illustrator.

Trixie dos Santos is obsessed with trickster gods, and she’s already had one epic adventure with a bunch of them. Now, life is sort of back to normal, but not for long . . .

When her grandma’s magical cauldron goes missing, Trixie is thrust into the underworld – and the only friends she can call on for help are those tricksy gods, notoriously hard to keep in line. Will Trixie be able to keep these maverick saviours on their best behaviour?

Shining a light on epic myths from cultures across the world, Let Sleeping Gods Lie is at once a thrilling and fascinating read.

Full of heart and humour, it has the potential to spark a lifelong interest in folklore and legends. Thiago's striking, distinctive artwork brings these incredible gods to life, creating a truly unique and unforgettable package.

We are thrilled to announce the WINNER of our Search for a Storyteller competition, with the Arvon Foundation!

FOR NEVER WAS A STORY by Miranda Moore

HUGE congratulations, Miranda! We're so excited to work with you. For Never Was a Story is an incredibly compelling, thought-provoking YA novel and we can't wait to bring it to readers.

We also want to thank everyone who entered the competition, and congratulate again all who were longlisted & shortlisted. We read so many fascinating, thought-provoking, engaging stories, and wish everyone the very best with their writing & storytelling.
